text: Here are the lights that I installed, picture lights, for this painting over here. They're remotely controlled by this app. And so right now it's daylight, so you can't really see how effective they are, but I can change the temperature and they will highlight this painting that we have on the wall above our fireplace. So I've installed two of them and I really like that I can control temperature, remote control, and the battery lasts a really long time. So they attach to the ceiling, but no wiring is required.
